Package uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player

Interface Summary
MediaPlayer Specification for a media player component.
MediaPlayerEventListener Specification for a component that is interested in receiving event notifications from the media player.
 

Class Summary
AbstractMediaPlayer Base implementation for media players sharing common behaviours.
AudioDevice Description of an audio output device.
AudioOutput Description of an audio output.
AudioTrackInfo Audio track info.
DefaultMediaPlayer Media player implementation.
MediaDetails Media meta data.
MediaMeta Representation of all available media meta data.
MediaPlayerEventAdapter Default implementation of the media player event listener.
MediaPlayerFactory Factory for media player instances.
MediaPlayerLatch This class implements a mechanism to play a media item and wait for it to start (or wait for it to raise an error instead of starting).
ModuleDescription Description of a module (e.g.
SpuTrackInfo  
TrackDescription Description of a track, e.g.
TrackInfo Base track info.
UnknownTrackInfo  
VideoOutputLatch Wait for a video output to be created.
VideoTrackInfo Video track info.
 

Enum Summary
AudioOutputDeviceType Enumeration of audio output device types.
DeinterlaceMode Enumeration of deinterlace modes.
